abstract: A U.S. District Court dismissed a lawsuit of former employees of Washington Mutual against JPMorgan Chase to recover their retirement account losses after the collapse of the thrift.
snippet: A U.S. District Court dismissed a lawsuit of former employees of Washington Mutual against JPMorgan Chase to recover their retirement account losses after the collapse of the thrift.
lead_paragraph: A United States District Court judge dismissed a lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase that was filed by former employees of Washington Mutual who are seeking against to recover their retirement account losses after the collapse of the thrift, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Judge Dismisses WaMu Employee Suit Against JPMorgan

abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s Jamie Dimon was among those who received threatening letters containing white powder during last fall’s financial crisis, according to Duff McDonald’s recent book on the bank chief.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s Jamie Dimon was among those who received threatening letters containing white powder during last fall’s financial crisis, according to Duff McDonald’s recent book on the bank chief.
lead_paragraph: Being the chief of a giant bank comes with considerable perks, including big bonuses, chauffeured limousines and private jets. But especially during a financial crisis, it can also make a person a target, an experience that Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, knows from first-hand experience.
